features.name: Auto-Launch Browser in Development
features.description: Configure WXT to automatically open the browser with the extension installed during development. Enables seamless development workflow by launching Chrome/Firefox with the extension pre-loaded when running npm run dev.
verification: wxt.config.ts updated with browser startup configuration
npm run dev automatically opens Chrome with extension installed
npm run dev:firefox automatically opens Firefox with extension installed
Extension loads without errors in auto-launched browser
Browser can be configured to open/not open via config
TypeScript compilation passes with no errors
